ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MICHÈLE RIVET, C.M., of Montréal, Quebec, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective January 22, 2023.
